summary: Seeking a position in a research institution or a university.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.company: College of Business Administration and Economics, New Mexico State University, NM
experience.description: Do market research, prepare and write business and marketing plans for start-up companies. Work under the supervision of Dr. Kevin Boberg, Associate Dean.

experience.title: Officer
experience.company: Industrial and Commercial Bank of Vietnam
experience.description: Translated banking documents in English to Vietnamese. Acted as an interpreter when needed. Developed and maintained the correspondent banking relationship with Russian banks. Kept track of loans borrowed from foreign banks. Worked on the Returnee project between Vietnam and the German Reconstruction Bank. Did other administrative and clerical work.

experience.title: Liaison Officer / Certificate of Liaison Officer
experience.description: Certificate of Liaison Officer by the Ministry of Trade, Vietnam. Group Prize) in the National Students' Scientific Research Competition organized by the Ministry of Education and Training. Innovative Medal for the Youth.

certifications: Certificate of Liaison Officer by the Ministry of Trade, Vietnam
